#summary Documentation of the Rend_Factory_Acl class.
#labels Phase-Implementation,Factories

= Description =
This class is an [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Abstract_factory_pattern Abstract Factory] for the [http://framework.zend.com/manual/en/zend.acl.html Zend_Acl] class.

= API =
|| *Method* || *Description* ||
|| `create()` || Get the [http://framework.zend.com/manual/en/zend.acl.html Zend_Acl] singleton instance ||
|| `setConfigFile(/* string */ $filename)` || Set the configuration file. This should be a `.php` file that uses `$acl` to setup the roles, resources and rules. ||

= Examples =
== Basic ==
Basic usage of the `Rend_Factory_Acl` is to create an instance of the factory and call it's `create()` method on demand.

{{{
class MyController extends Rend_Controller_Action {
    public function init() {
        $aclFactory = new Rend_Factory_Acl();
        $this->_acl = $aclFactory->create();
    }
}
}}}
